ðŸ“– Summary: AirPodsDesktop is a C++ application designed to improve the AirPods user experience on Windows and Linux. It provides features such as battery information display, automatic ear detection, low audio latency mode, and visually appealing animations. The application aims to integrate AirPods seamlessly with desktop environments, offering a more convenient and intuitive user experience.
